Title: Relates to directing the commissioner of the department of environmental conservation to promulgate rules and regulations establishing targets for the sales of zero emissions heavy duty vehicles in the state
Summary: Directs the commissioner of the department of environmental conservation to promulgate rules and regulations establishing targets for the sales of zero emissions heavy duty vehicles in the state.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the commissioner of the department of environmental conservation to promulgate rules and regulations establishing targets for the sales of zero emissions heavy duty vehicles in the state
